item.title: Hello World
About
item.description: Tech geek since a young age, now knee-deep in a Master’s in Cybersecurity at the University of Aveiro. I live and breathe software development, where I’ve developed a strong interest in network security, malware and reverse engineering. I started my research journey tackling Software Defined Networks with a Graduate Research Scholarship and currently working on improving support for legacy non-5G devices in 5G network by improving authentication and authorization mechanisms between them.
